Name: Police Chase
About the game: You're a fleeing delinquent, you're being chased by the police. At the wheel of many cars you try to avoid being caught by the police while collecting as much money as possible! Your enrichment will allow you to unlock many more powerful and tougher cars, as well as new maps where your driving skills will be put to the test. Choose your getaway vehicle according to its power, life points, handling or the damage it inflicts! You will find 2 items on your way. Tools to fix your car and bundles of money to make you rich. Important point: ➡ Exclusive map ! ➡ Steam ranking ! ➡ Addictive ! Will you be the cleverest driver? Share your scores and chase photos in the Steam P.C. community!
